scripts.build-d: yarn run delete && yarn run new-folder && cat config/config-d.js > config/config.js
scripts.build-q: yarn run delete && yarn run new-folder && cat config/config-q.js > config/config.js
scripts.build-p: yarn run delete && yarn run new-folder && cat config/config-p.js > config/config.js
scripts.env-3: node config/config.js --myVar="Test console output." one two=three four
